mapper.select: select equipment_id from mj_access_para_info where id=#{id}
select * from mj_access_para_info where del_flag='0' and equipment_id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM mj_access_para_info WHERE id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
SELECT * FROM mj_access_para_info WHERE equipment_id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE mj_access_para_info SET equipment_id=#{equipmentId}, door_relay_time=#{doorRelayTime}, door_delay_time=#{doorDelayTime}, enter_opera_time=#{enterOperaTime}, check_opera_time=#{checkOperaTime}, out_tips_time=#{outTipsTime}, alarm_interval_time=#{alarmIntervalTime}, remote_over_time=#{remoteOverTime}, auth_type=#{authType}, center_permit=#{centerPermit}, comb_num=#{combNum}, base1=#{base1}, base2=#{base2}, base3=#{base3}, base4=#{base4}, base5=#{base5}, base6=#{base6}, work_time1=#{workTime1}, work_time2=#{workTime2}, net_out_age1=#{netOutAge1}, net_out_age2=#{netOutAge2}, remarks=#{remarks} WHERE id=#{id}
